Summary: Dark object with red light on top.
divs: sighting details i was walking down a old logging road below the house heading south. i notice a red light up in the trees that i took it to be the red beacon on top of the water tower in town. i decide to make my walk easier by getting on the rail roads tracks. to do that i had to turn west. i headed towards the light. i was very dark, but the moon was giving off enough light to make out the ruts on the road. when i got to a familiar deer stand i headed east because i new that there was a small pine grove with no under growth, making it easier to reach the railroad tracks. i barely walked off the road about 10yd. then i notices what i thought was a police car parked in the woods. it was black on bottom. it had a red light on top, and was clear in the middle. i can remember seeing the red glow in the interior i thought was a police radio. i could hear that it was making sounds of static like the police radios do. so immediately took it that it was a couple of police officers parked in the woods. i could see inside of what i then thought was a police car. i could even make out the outline of a figure in the driver's see. i walked within arms lenghts of this vehicle. not for a second i didnt think it was a police. it was black till about the trunk hight of a police cruiser. it had red\amber glow inside of it,about the width of a car windshield. it had a rectangle red light on top of it about 4x8 in size.it was square\retangle at the back but came to a triangle at the top. pyramid shape. i paniced and said wtf and took of full speed. just as i turned i noticed a very bright amber light engulfed me. i never looked back. at the time i have a cpl of warrants, and definetly didnt want to see a police. especially in a dark secluded place. after running to a safe place i took a few minutes to rationalize what i just saw. i knew one thing for certain, there was no way a car was capable of being where that object was. there is barerly access to 4x4 atv the road is awful and filles with deep mudpuddles a car could never negate. i also thought due to recent event, i have reason to believe that what i witnessed was a ufo. i actually walked up on it arms length away. there was now way that was a cop with the window down.. because if i could hear their radio, he could here me say wtf.. out loud and then me barrelling through the thick under growth. i sounded like a spooked deer tearing through the brush. i was thinking at the time why arent they chasing me. everything happened so fast. one minute im looking up through the treeline following a red light, then next im 2 feet away from the red light. i can remember the glow of the light that i thought was the interior of a car changing colors. at first it was clear white. then it was red then it was bright amber like the street light. it flashed so brightly as i turned that i could not see anything. it took a second for my vision to come back and by then i had over ran the original trail i was following. while the light was clear like the interior light of a car i could definetly se a single shape i took to be a driver. it looked like when u look through the back glass of a car. but ican remember only seeing one seat. something else i can remember is that the radio never said anywords, it just made a jumbled static like sounds. recently i took my wife to see the place where i seen the car\ufo? i went there from the track just to see if it was possible for a car to have been wherei saw it. that answere is no. it was at least a cpl hundred yards from the track to where i saw the strange object. at the time there was only a deer trail through there. now there is a 4wheeler trail giving the hunters easier access to that deer stand. that night i new it was too dark to get on the deer trail so i just wanted to walk throught the young pines where i knew there was no under growth. and also like i said as soon ass i took a couple of steps off the main trial i was on, it was right there, arms lenght in front of me. talk about close encounter.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Junction City
There were no other sightings in Junction City on or around May 15th 1995
